backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and admin-managed offers with create, update, delete operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a footer credit-line update to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including layout, pages, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme variables and global element defaults.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all routes and wrapping them in layout and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that restricts access to admin-only routes with login and error handling UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication state and query cache.
frontend/src/components/cta/FloatingCont: Floating WhatsApp and phone call action buttons with tooltips.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing store info, quick links, category list, Caffeine.ai link, and Aditya Sharma credit.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with navigation links, admin-only actions, login, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, main content, and floating contact CTAs.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Catego: Displays a category card with image, title, and description using a responsive image.
Grid of quick-link buttons for major categories, each with an icon and navigation action.
frontend/src/components/marketing/TrustI: Shows three trust indicator cards highlighting quality, pricing, and convenience.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Section listing five benefits of the store with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/media/Responsive: Wrapper for an img tag supporting lazy/priority loading and optional aspect ratio styling.
frontend/src/components/offers/OfferCard: Card displaying offer details including discount badge and formatted date range.
frontend/src/components/offers/OfferEdit: Dialog form for creating or editing offers with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document title, meta tags, and optional structured data for SEO.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Hook that fetches and returns whether the current actor has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/offers/useActiveOffer: Hook fetching active offers via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/offers/useAdminOffers: Admin offers management hook providing CRUD mutations and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode variants, animations, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero content, store story, values, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOffersPage: Admin interface for creating, editing, deleting, and toggling offers with dialogs and table views. Handles CRUD operations via useAdminOffers and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays product categories in a styled grid with SEO setup and supporting sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows store contact info, location details, and embedded map along with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing-focused home page with hero banners, category links, trust indicators, and promotional sections. Uses navigation buttons and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Displays active offers with a hero banner, savings message, and conditional loading/error states. Fetches offers and renders OfferCard components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing parameters from hash routing. Supports fallback between URL and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color system, typography, animations, and container settings. Defines custom themes, shadows, fonts, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for building a responsive multi-page marketing site for IN2 Supermart. Lists architectural notes, existing features, and planned pages and content.
